languages.text: {n}Мостик обволакивает непривычная тишина — дежурные офицеры забились по углам и с любопытством наблюдают за тем, что происходит в центре.{/n}
{n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мостик обволакивает непривычная тишина — дежурные офицеры забились по углам и с любопытством наблюдают за тем, что происходит в центре.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners and are watching the events unfolding in the centre with curiosity.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}舰桥笼罩在不同寻常的沉寂中。当值的军官都聚在角落，好奇地注视着舰桥中央发生的一切。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥笼罩在不同寻常的沉寂中。当值的军官都聚在角落，好奇地注视着舰桥中央发生的一切。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}El puente de mando está sumido en un silencio inusual; los oficiales de servicio se agolpan en los rincones, observando con curiosidad lo que sucede en el centro de la sala.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El puente de mando está sumido en un silencio inusual; los oficiales de servicio se agolpan en los rincones, observando con curiosidad lo que sucede en el centro de la sala.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un silence inhabituel règne sur la passerelle : les officiers en service se sont agglutinés dans les coins de la salle, observant avec curiosité la scène qui se déroule en son centre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un silence inhabituel règne sur la passerelle : les officiers en service se sont agglutinés dans les coins de la salle, observant avec curiosité la scène qui se déroule en son centre.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auf der Brücke ist es ungewöhnlich ruhig – die diensthabenden Offiziere drängen sich in den Ecken zusammen und beobachten neugierig, was sich in der Mitte abspielt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der Brücke ist es ungewöhnlich ruhig – die diensthabenden Offiziere drängen sich in den Ecken zusammen und beobachten neugierig, was sich in der Mitte abspielt.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ブリッジは異様な静寂に包まれている。当直の士官らは隅に身を寄せ、中央で起こっていることを不思議そうに見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is enveloped in an unusual silence — the officers on duty are huddling in the corners, looking on curiously at what is transpiring in the centre.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジは異様な静寂に包まれている。当直の士官らは隅に身を寄せ、中央で起こっていることを不思議そうに見つめていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Köprüye alışılmadık bir sessizlik hâkim. Subaylar köşelerde toplanmış, ortada olanları merakla izliyor.{/n}
